title: The Spanish Civil War and beyond
description: Jonathan Dimbleby listens to the 1930s drumbeat of war through the burgeoning reporting skills of the BBC’s newly-appointed reporter corps.
itunes:subtitle: The 1930s drumbeat of war through the burgeoning reporting skills of the BBC's reporters.
itunes:summary: Jonathan Dimbleby listens to the 1930s drumbeat of war through the burgeoning reporting skills of the BBC’s newly-appointed reporter corps.
itunes:author: BBC World Service
